TopicTitle: bring up nav ball in map view.

Articles.Content: Previously, I always perssed the delete button on the number pad to bring up the nav ball. now for some reason it switches to docking mode. I know I can get the nav ball up by clicking on the grey arrow, but its really annoying since my mouse is very un-responsive. I've checked in the settings, and I can't switch it back. is there anyway to assign this back?
Is by any chance your Numlock switched off?
Theres a button on the bottom of map view that will bring up the nav ball.
